title: Heather Grey Crew Neck Sweatshirt
image_prompt: flat-lay product render of a heather grey crew neck sweatshirt, isolated on plain white background, high-detail fabric texture, visible stitching, ribbed cuffs and hem, no model, no mannequin, no human, no lifestyle scene
techpack: Regular fit crew neck sweatshirt in heather grey cotton-poly fleece. Ribbed neckline, cuffs, and hem for structure. Double-needle stitching for durability. Hip length with long sleeves. Suitable for casual wear.
provenance: Designed based on combination of grey color palette and crew neck neckline trend.
